home.parrafo-info: Systems Engineering student and programmer focused on backend solutions and process optimization. Passionate about efficiency and automation, I seek to create projects that integrate technology and logistics to improve data management and operational processes.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I'm a Systems Engineering student and programmer with experience in software development and backoffice systems. I am passionate about creating technological solutions that optimize processes and improve business management. I aspire to grow professionally in the field of systems engineering, gaining experience in software development and project coordination.

I am a proactive and committed person, with skills in data analysis, web development, and inventory management. I value teamwork and continuous learning, always seeking to improve my skills and contribute to every project.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A CRUD application that allows task management, including Create - Read - Update - Delete, fundamental for an introduction to Backend.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills, and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can type a text, and the encryptor encodes it with pre-programmed keys. The encryptor can also decrypt the text.
